resources.string: Click hear to view the video

The robotic arm stores three training modes.People choose one according to the needs . It also provided customized training programs. Users can select training mode, view training records and training reports through the APP.
Paramedics monitored the training data of multiple patients remotely in real time.

Unlike the heavy, bulky traditional mechanical arm, we choose carbon fiber, ABS and other materials to achieve lightweight and nice strength. In addition, the material touched with the human body feels comfortable.
We use sliding mode impedance control/ based on improved reaching law, to achieve fast and stable trajectory. Structure design is more ergonomic.
No device is connected, please go to the "Connection" module to connect.
The application cannot be used without Bluetooth or location permission.
Restart the app to apply the language settings
重启应用以应用语言设置
